cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with the problem of Scene Text Recognition (STR), which involves recognizing text in images. This is a problem that is commonly studied in computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The paper also introduces a novel method for bidirectional text decoding, which involves using a single decoder instead of two separate decoders. This method involves optimizing the decoding process, which is a task that is commonly studied in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper evaluates the performance of the proposed method on various benchmarks, which is a task that is commonly studied in information retrieval (cs.IR).
